content: FREE home warranty! Call back now for a GUARANTEED deal!!!
Hello! This is the XYZ Home Services scheduling assistant. How may I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Congrats on winning a free AC unit! Just send your info to claim!!!

It seems you're sending promotional messages. If you are not a customer needing service, this is not the correct number to contact. I am marking this number as spam and will end this conversation now.
